attributes.action: Close the channel tunnel to stop immigrants entering the uk!
attributes.background: The amount of immigrants entering this country at the moment is simply out of control, WE MUST ACT NOW.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105337

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
